# isDocumentEdited

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the document has unsaved changes.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isDocumentEdited: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the document has been edited. The edited status of each document window reflects the document’s edited status.

## Related Documentation

- **updateChangeCount(_:)**: Updates the receiver’s change count according to the given change type.
- **isDocumentEdited**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the window’s document has been edited.

## Getting Document Metadata

- **fileURL**: The location of the document’s on-disk representation.
- **isEntireFileLoaded**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the document’s file is completely loaded into memory.
- **fileModificationDate**: The last-known modification date of the document’s on-disk representation.
- **keepBackupFile**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the document archives previously saved versions of the document.
- **isDraft**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the document is a draft that the user has not yet saved.
- **fileType**: The name of the document type, as specified in the app’s information property-list file.
- **isInViewingMode**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the document is in read-only mode.
